   22: %%
   23: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpc_SUITE).
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(httpc_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   32: -include("http_internal.hrl").
   33: -include("httpc_internal.hrl").
   34: % -include("../../ssl/src/ssl_api.hrl").
   35: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   36: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   37: 
   38: -define(URL_START, "http://").
   39: -define(TLS_URL_START, "https://").
   40: -define(NOT_IN_USE_PORT, 8997).
   41: -define(profile(Config), proplists:get_value(profile, Config, httpc:default_profile())).
   42: 
   43: -define(SSL_NO_VERIFY, {ssl, [{verify, verify_none}]}).
   44: 
   45: %% Using hardcoded file path to keep it below 107 characters
   46: %% (maximum length supported by erlang)
   47: -define(UNIX_SOCKET, "/tmp/inets_httpc_SUITE.sock").
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap,{seconds, 30}}
   55:     ].
   56: 
   57: all() ->
   58:     [
   59:      {group, http},
   60:      {group, http_ipv6},
   61:      {group, sim_http},
   62:      {group, sim_http_process_leak},
   63:      {group, sim_http_ipv6},
   64:      {group, http_internal},
   65:      {group, http_unix_socket},
   66:      {group, https},
   67:      {group, sim_https},
   68:      {group, misc},
   69:      {group, sim_mixed} % HTTP and HTTPS sim servers
   70:     ].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [
   74:      {http, [parallel], real_requests()},
   75:      {http_ipv6, [parallel], [request_options]},
   76:      {sim_http, [parallel], only_simulated() ++ server_closing_connection()},
   77:      {sim_http_process_leak, [process_leak_on_keepalive]},
   78:      {sim_http_ipv6, [parallel], only_simulated() ++ server_closing_connection()
   79:           % The following two tests are not functional on IPv6 yet:
   80:           % ++ [process_leak_on_keepalive]
   81:           -- [server_closing_connection_on_second_response]
   82:           },
   83:      {http_internal, [parallel], real_requests_esi()},
   84:      {http_internal_minimum_bytes, [parallel], [remote_socket_close_parallel]},
   85:      {http_unix_socket, [parallel], simulated_unix_socket()},
   86:      {https, [parallel], [def_ssl_opt | real_requests()]},
   87:      {sim_https, [parallel], only_simulated()},
   88:      {misc, [parallel], misc()},
   89:      {sim_mixed, [parallel], sim_mixed()}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: real_requests()->
   93:     [
   94:      head,
   95:      get,
   96:      get_query_string,
   97:      post,
   98:      delete,
   99:      post_stream,
  100:      patch,
  101:      async,
  102:      pipeline,
  103:      persistent_connection,
  104:      save_to_file,
  105:      save_to_file_async,
  106:      page_does_not_exist,
  107:      emulate_lower_versions,
  108:      headers,
  109:      headers_as_is,
  110:      header_type_0,
  111:      header_type_1,
  112:      header_type_2,
  113:      header_type_3,
  114:      header_type_4,
  115:      header_type_5,
  116:      header_type_6,
  117:      header_type_7,
  118:      header_type_8,
  119:      header_type_9,
  120:      header_type_10,
  121:      header_type_11,
  122:      header_type_12,
  123:      header_type_13,
  124:      header_type_14,
  125:      header_type_15,
  126:      header_type_16,
  127:      header_type_17,
  128:      header_type_18,
  129:      header_type_19,
  130:      header_type_20,
  131:      header_type_21,
  132:      header_type_22,
  133:      header_type_23,
  134:      empty_body,
  135:      stream,
  136:      stream_to_pid,
  137:      stream_through_fun,
  138:      stream_through_mfa,
  139:      streaming_error,
  140:      inet_opts,
  141:      invalid_headers,
  142:      invalid_headers_key,
  143:      invalid_headers_value,
  144:      invalid_body,
  145:      invalid_body_fun,
  146:      invalid_method,
  147:      no_scheme,
  148:      invalid_uri,
  149:      binary_url,
  150:      iolist_body
  151:     ].
  152: 
  153: real_requests_esi() ->
  154:     [slow_connection].
  155: 
  156: simulated_unix_socket() ->
  157:     [unix_domain_socket,
  158:     invalid_ipfamily_unix_socket].
  159: 
  160: only_simulated() ->
  161:     [
  162:      cookie,
  163:      cookie_profile,
  164:      empty_set_cookie,
  165:      invalid_set_cookie,
  166:      trace,
  167:      stream_once,
  168:      stream_single_chunk,
  169:      stream_no_length,
  170:      not_streamed_once,
  171:      stream_large_not_200_or_206,
  172:      no_content_204,
  173:      tolerate_missing_CR,
  174:      userinfo,
  175:      bad_response,
  176:      timeout_redirect,
  177:      internal_server_error,
  178:      invalid_http,
  179:      invalid_chunk_size,
  180:      headers_dummy,
  181:      headers_with_obs_fold,
  182:      headers_conflict_chunked_with_length,
  183:      empty_response_header,
  184:      remote_socket_close,
  185:      remote_socket_close_async,
  186:      transfer_encoding,
  187:      transfer_encoding_identity,
  188:      redirect_loop,
  189:      redirect_moved_permanently,
  190:      redirect_multiple_choises,
  191:      redirect_found,
  192:      redirect_see_other,
  193:      redirect_temporary_redirect,
  194:      redirect_permanent_redirect,
  195:      redirect_relative_uri,
  196:      port_in_host_header,
  197:      redirect_port_in_host_header,
  198:      relaxed,
  199:      multipart_chunks,
  200:      get_space,
  201:      delete_no_body,
  202:      post_with_content_type,
  203:      stream_fun_server_close
  204:     ].
  205: 
  206: server_closing_connection() ->
  207:     [
  208:      server_closing_connection_on_first_response,
  209:      server_closing_connection_on_second_response
  210:     ].
  211: 
  212: misc() ->
  213:     [
  214:      server_does_not_exist,
  215:      timeout_memory_leak,
  216:      wait_for_whole_response,
  217:      post_204_chunked,
  218:      head_chunked_empty_body,
  219:      head_empty_body,
  220:      chunkify_fun
  221:     ].
  222: 
  223: sim_mixed() ->
  224:     [
  225:      redirect_http_to_https,
  226:      redirect_relative_different_port
  227:     ].
  228: 
  229: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  230: 
  231: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  232:     logger:set_primary_config(level, warning),
  233:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  234:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  235:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets]),
  236:     ServerRoot = filename:join(PrivDir, "server_root"),
  237:     DocRoot = filename:join(ServerRoot, "htdocs"),
  238:     setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir),
  239:     [{server_root, ServerRoot}, {doc_root, DocRoot}  | Config].
  240: 
  241: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  242:     inets_test_lib:stop_apps([inets]),
  243:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  244:     inets_test_lib:del_dirs(PrivDir),
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  248: init_per_group(misc = Group, Config) ->
  249:     start_apps(Group),
  250:     Inet = inet_version(),
  251:     [{httpc_options, [{ipfamily, Inet}]} | Config];
  252: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group =:= sim_https; Group =:= https;
  253:                                     Group =:= sim_mixed ->
  254:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  255:     try application:start(crypto) of
  256:         ok ->
  257:             start_apps(Group),
  258:             HttpcOptions = [{keep_alive_timeout, 50000}, {max_keep_alive_length, 5}],
  259:             [{httpc_options, HttpcOptions} | do_init_per_group(Group, Config0)]
  260:     catch
  261:         _:_ ->
  262:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  263:     end;
  264: init_per_group(http_unix_socket = Group, Config0) ->
  265:     case os:type() of
  266:         {win32,_} ->
  267:             {skip, "Unix Domain Sockets are not supported on Windows"};
  268:         _ ->
  269:             file:delete(?UNIX_SOCKET),
  270:             start_apps(Group),
  271:             Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  272:             {Pid, Port, HttpcOpts} = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  273:             lists:append([{dummy_server_pid, Pid}, {port, Port}, {httpc_options, HttpcOpts}],
  274:                          Config)
  275:     end;
  276: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == http_ipv6;
  277:                                     Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
  278:     case is_ipv6_supported() of
  279:         true ->
  280:             start_apps(Group),
  281:             Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  282:             Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  283:             [{port, Port}, {request_opts, [{socket_opts, [{ipfamily, inet6}]}]} | Config];
  284:         false ->
  285:             {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
  286:      end;
  287: init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  288:     start_apps(Group),
  289:     Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  290:     Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  291:     [{port, Port} | Config].
  292: 
  293: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: do_init_per_group(Group=sim_mixed, Config0) ->
  297:     % The mixed group uses two server ports (http and https), so we use
  298:     % different config names here.
  299:     Config1 = init_ssl(Config0),
  300:     Config2 = proplists:delete(http_port, proplists:delete(https_port, Config1)),
  301:     {HttpPort, HttpsPort} = server_start(Group, server_config(sim_https, Config2)),
  302:     [{http_port, HttpPort} | [{https_port, HttpsPort} | Config2]];
  303: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  304:     Config1 =
  305:         case Group of
  306:             https ->
  307:                 init_ssl(Config0);
  308:             sim_https ->
  309:                 init_ssl(Config0);
  310:             _ ->
  311:                 Config0
  312:         end,
  313:     Config = proplists:delete(port, Config1),
  314:     Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  315:     [{port, Port} | Config].
  316: 
  317: init_ssl(Config) ->
  318:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
  319:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
  320:     GenCertData =
  321:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  322:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)},
  323:                                                    {digest, sha256}],
  324:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)},
  325:                                                              {digest, sha256}]],
  326:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)},
  327:                                                    {digest, sha256}]
  328:                                          },
  329:                                     client_chain =>
  330:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)},
  331:                                                    {digest, sha256}],
  332:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)},
  333:                                                              {digest, sha256}]],
  334:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)},{digest, sha256}]}}),
  335:     Conf = inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),
  336:     [{ssl_conf, Conf} | Config].
  337: 
  338: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  339: init_per_testcase(Name, Config) when Name == pipeline; Name == persistent_connection ->
  340:     inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Name}]),
  341:     GivenOptions = proplists:get_value(httpc_options, Config, []),
  342:     ok = httpc:set_options([{pipeline_timeout, 50000},
  343:                             {max_pipeline_length, 3} | GivenOptions], Name),
  344: 
  345:     [{profile, Name} | Config];
  346: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  347:     {ok, _Pid} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Case}]),
  348:     GivenOptions = proplists:get_value(httpc_options, Config, []),
  349:     ok = httpc:set_options(GivenOptions, Case),
  350:     [{profile, Case} | Config].
  351: 
  352: end_per_testcase(Case, Config)
  353:   when Case == server_closing_connection_on_first_response;
  354:        Case == server_closing_connection_on_second_response ->
  355:     %% Test case uses at most one session.  Ensure no leftover
  356:     %% sessions left behind.
  357:     {_, Status} = proplists:lookup(tc_status, Config),
  358:     ShallCleanup = case Status of
  359:                        ok -> true;
  360:                        {failed, _} -> true;
  361:                        {skipped, _} -> false
  362:                    end,
  363:     if ShallCleanup =:= true ->
  364:             httpc:request(url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), ?profile(Config)),
  365:             ok;
  366:        true ->
  367:             ct:log("Not cleaning up because test case status was ~p", [Status]),
  368:             ok
  369:     end,
  370:     inets:stop(httpc, ?config(profile, Config));
  371: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  372:     inets:stop(httpc, ?config(profile, Config)).
  373: 
  374: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  375: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  376: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  377: head() ->
  378:     [{doc, "Test http head request against local server."}].
  379: 
  380: head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  381:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  382:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}} = httpc:request(head, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  383:                                                    [], ?profile(Config)).
  384: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  385: get() ->
  386:     [{doc, "Test http get request against local server"}].
  387: get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  388:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  389:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  390:                                                                [], ?profile(Config)),
  391: 
  392:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body),
  393: 
  394:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], BinBody}} =  httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  395:                                                          [{body_format, binary}], ?profile(Config)),
  396:     true = is_binary(BinBody).
  397: 
  398: 
  399: get_query_string() ->
  400:     [{doc, "Test http get request with query string against local server"}].
  401: get_query_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  402:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html?foo=bar", Config), []},
  403:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  404:                                                                [], ?profile(Config)),
  405: 
  406:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
  407: 
  408: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  409: get_space() ->
  410:     [{"Test http get request with '%20' in the path of the URL."}].
  411: get_space(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  412:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/space%20.html", Config), []},
  413:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  414:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  415:                                                                RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
  416: 
  417:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
  418: 
  419: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  420: post() ->
  421:     [{doc, "Test http post request against local server. We do in this case "
  422:      "only care about the client side of the the post. The server "
  423:      "script will not actually use the post data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  424: post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     CGI = case os:type() of
  426: 	      {win32, _} ->
  427: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  428: 	      _ ->
  429: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  430: 	  end,
  431: 
  432:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  433: 
  434:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  435:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  436: 
  437:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  438: 	httpc:request(post, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  439: 			     "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  440: 
  441:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  442: 	httpc:request(post, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  443: 			     "text/plain", "foobar"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  444: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  445: delete() ->
  446:     [{doc, "Test http delete request against local server. We do in this case "
  447:      "only care about the client side of the the delete. The server "
  448:      "script will not actually use the delete data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  449: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  450:     CGI = case os:type() of
  451:           {win32, _} ->
  452:           "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  453:           _ ->
  454:           "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  455:       end,
  456: 
  457:     URL  = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  458:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  459: 
  460:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  461:     httpc:request(delete, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  462:                  "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  463: 
  464:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  465:     httpc:request(delete, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  466:                  "text/plain", "foobar"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  467: 
  468: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  469: patch() ->
  470:     [{"Test http patch request against local server. We do in this case "
  471:      "only care about the client side of the the patch. The server "
  472:      "script will not actually use the patch data."}].
  473: patch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     CGI = case os:type() of
  475: 	      {win32, _} ->
  476: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  477: 	      _ ->
  478: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  479: 	  end,
  480: 
  481:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  482: 
  483:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  484:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  485: 
  486:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  487: 	httpc:request(patch, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  488: 			     "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  489: 
  490: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  491: post_stream() ->
  492:     [{doc, "Test streaming http post request against local server. "
  493:      "We only care about the client side of the the post. "
  494:      "The server script will not actually use the post data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  495: post_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  496:     CGI = case os:type() of
  497: 	      {win32, _} ->
  498: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  499: 	      _ ->
  500: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  501: 	  end,
  502: 
  503:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  504: 
  505:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  506:     BodyFun = fun(0) ->
  507: 		      eof;
  508: 		 (LenLeft) ->
  509: 		      {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
  510: 	      end,
  511: 
  512:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  513: 	httpc:request(post, {URL,
  514: 			     [{"expect", "100-continue"},
  515: 			      {"content-length", "100"}],
  516: 			     "text/plain", {BodyFun, 100}}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  517: 
  518:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  519: 	httpc:request(post, {URL,
  520: 			     [{"expect", "100-continue"},
  521: 			      {"content-length", "10"}],
  522: 			     "text/plain", {BodyFun, 10}}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  523: 
  524: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  525: trace() ->
  526:     [{doc, "Perform a TRACE request."}].
  527: trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  528:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/trace.html", Config), []},
  529:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  530:     case httpc:request(trace, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)) of
  531: 	{ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], "TRACE /trace.html" ++ _}} ->
  532: 	    ok;
  533: 	 Other ->
  534: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Other})
  535:     end.  
  536: 
  537: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  538: 
  539: pipeline(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  540:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  541:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  542: 
  543:     %% Make sure pipeline session is registered
  544:     ct:sleep(4000),
  545:     keep_alive_requests(Request, pipeline).
  546: 
  547: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  548: 
  549: persistent_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  550:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  551:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  552: 
  553:     %% Make sure pipeline session is registered
  554:     ct:sleep(4000),
  555:     keep_alive_requests(Request, persistent_connection).
  556: 
  557: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  558: async() ->
  559:     [{doc, "Test an asynchrony http request."}].
  560: async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  561:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  562:     {ok, RequestId} =
  563:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], ?profile(Config)),
  564:     Body =
  565:         receive
  566:             {http, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, BinBody}}} ->
  567:                 BinBody;
  568:             {http, Msg} ->
  569:                 ct:fail(Msg)
  570:         end,
  571:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)),
  572: 
  573:     %% Check full result false option for async request
  574:     {ok, RequestId2} =
  575:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false},
  576:                                          {full_result, false}]),
  577:     Body2 =
  578:         receive
  579:             {http, {RequestId2, {200, BinBody2}}} ->
  580:                 BinBody2;
  581:             {http, Msg2} ->
  582:                 ct:fail(Msg2)
  583:         end,
  584:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body2)),
  585: 
  586:     {ok, NewRequestId} =
  587: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}]),
  588:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(NewRequestId).
  589: 
  590: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  591: save_to_file() ->
  592:     [{doc, "Test to save the http body to a file"}].
  593: save_to_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  594:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  595:     FilePath = filename:join(PrivDir, "dummy.html"),
  596:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  597:     Request = {URL, []},
  598:     {ok, saved_to_file}
  599: 	= httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{stream, FilePath}], ?profile(Config)),
  600:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(FilePath),
  601:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} = httpc:request(URL, ?profile(Config)),
  602:     Bin == Body.
  603: 
  604: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  605: save_to_file_async() ->
  606:     [{doc,"Test to save the http body to a file"}].
  607: save_to_file_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  608:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  609:     FilePath = filename:join(PrivDir, "dummy.html"),
  610:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  611:     Request = {URL, []},
  612:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  613:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  614: 				    [{stream, FilePath},
  615: 				     {sync, false}], Profile),
  616:     receive
  617: 	{http, {RequestId, saved_to_file}} ->
  618: 	    ok;
  619: 	{http, Msg} ->
  620: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  621:     end,
  622: 
  623:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(FilePath),
  624:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} = httpc:request(URL, Profile),
  625:     Bin == Body.
  626: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  627: stream() ->
  628:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  629: stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  630:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  631:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  632:     stream_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  633: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  634: stream_once() ->
  635:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  636: stream_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  637:     Request0  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  638:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  639:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  640:     stream_test(Request0, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  641: 
  642:     Request1  = {url(group_name(Config), "/once.html", Config), []},
  643:     stream_test(Request1, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  644: 
  645:     Request2  = {url(group_name(Config), "/once_chunked.html", Config), []},
  646:     stream_test(Request2, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  647: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  648: stream_single_chunk() ->
  649:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  650: stream_single_chunk(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  651:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/single_chunk.html", Config), []},
  652:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  653:     stream_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  654: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  655: stream_no_length() ->
  656:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests with HTTP 1.0 "
  657:       "body end on closed connection" }].
  658: stream_no_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  659:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_0_no_length_single.html", Config), []},
  660:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  661:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  662:     stream_test(Request1, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  663:     Request2 = {url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html", Config), []},
  664:     stream_test(Request2, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  665: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  666: stream_large_not_200_or_206() ->
  667:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for large responses with status codes "
  668:       "other than 200 or 206" }].
  669: stream_large_not_200_or_206(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  670:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/large_404_response.html", Config), []},
  671:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  672:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  673: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  674: not_streamed_once() ->
  675:     [{doc, "Test not streamed responses with once streaming"}].
  676: not_streamed_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  677:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/404.html", Config), []},
  678:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  679:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  680:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request0, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  681:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/404_chunked.html", Config), []},
  682:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request1, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  683:

  685: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  686: redirect_multiple_choises() ->
  687:     [{doc, "The user agent, selection of the most appropriate choice MAY "
  688:       "be performed automatically."}].
  689: redirect_multiple_choises(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     URL300 = url(group_name(Config), "/300.html", Config),
  691:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  692:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  693: 
  694:     catch {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  695: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL300, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  696: 
  697:     {ok, {{_,300,_}, [_ | _], _}} =
  698: 	httpc:request(get, {URL300, []}, [{autoredirect, false},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  699:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
  700: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  701: redirect_moved_permanently() ->
  702:     [{doc, "The server SHOULD generate a Location header field in the response "
  703:       "containing a preferred URI reference for the new permanent URI.  The user "
  704:       "agent MAY use the Location field value for automatic redirection.  The server's " 
  705:       "response payload usually contains a short hypertext note with a "
  706:       "hyperlink to the new URI(s)."}].
  707: redirect_moved_permanently(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  708: 
  709:     URL301 = url(group_name(Config), "/301.html", Config),
  710:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  711:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  712: 
  713:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  714: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  715: 
  716:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  717: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  718: 
  719:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  720: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, [],"text/plain", "foobar"},
  721: 			[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  722: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  842: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  843: redirect_http_to_https() ->
  844:     [{doc, "Test that a 30X redirect from one scheme to another is handled "
  845:       "correctly."}].
  846: redirect_http_to_https(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  847:     URL301 = mixed_url(http, "/301_custom_url.html", Config),
  848:     TargetUrl = mixed_url(https, "/dummy.html", Config),
  849:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  850:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  851:     Headers = [{"x-test-301-url", TargetUrl}],
  852: 
  853:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  854: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, Headers}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  855: 
  856:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  857: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, Headers}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  858: 
  859:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  860: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, Headers, "text/plain", "foobar"},
  861: 			[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  862: 
  863: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  864: redirect_relative_different_port() ->
  865:     [{doc, "Test that a 30X redirect with a relative target, but different "
  866:       "port, is handled correctly."}].
  867: redirect_relative_different_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  868:     URL301 = mixed_url(http, "/301_custom_url.html", Config),
  869:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  870:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  871: 
  872:     % We need an extra server of the same protocol here, so spawn a new
  873:     % HTTP-protocol one
  874:     Port = server_start(sim_http, []),
  875:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  876:     % Prefix the URI with '/' instead of a scheme
  877:     TargetUrl = "//" ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
  878:     Headers = [{"x-test-301-url", TargetUrl}],
  879: 
  880:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  881: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, Headers}, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
  882: 
  883:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  884: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, Headers}, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
  885: 
  886:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  887: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, Headers, "text/plain", "foobar"},
  888: 			[], RequestOpts, Profile).
  889: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  890: cookie() ->
  891:     [{doc, "Test cookies on the default profile."}].
  892: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  893:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}]),
  894: 
  895:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/cookie.html", Config), []},
  896:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  897: 
  898:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  899: 	= httpc:request(get, Request0, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts),
  900: 
  901:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/", Config), []},
  902: 
  903:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} = global:trans(
  904:         {cookies, verify},
  905:         fun() -> httpc:request(get, Request1, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts) end,
  906:         [node()],
  907:         100
  908:     ),
  909: 
  910:    [{session_cookies, [_|_]}] = httpc:which_cookies(httpc:default_profile()),
  911: 
  912:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, disabled}]).
  913: 
  914: 
  915: 
  916: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  917: cookie_profile() ->
  918:     [{doc, "Test cookies on a non default profile."}].
  919: cookie_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  920:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  921:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}], Profile),
  922: 
  923:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/cookie.html", Config), []},
  924:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  925: 
  926:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  927: 	= httpc:request(get, Request0, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  928: 
  929:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/", Config), []},
  930: 
  931:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} = global:trans(
  932:         {cookies, verify},
  933:         fun() -> httpc:request(get, Request1, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile) end,
  934:         [node()],
  935:         100
  936:     ).
  937:

  984: userinfo() ->
  985:     [{doc, "Test user info e.i. http://user:passwd@host:port/"}].
  986: userinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  987:     
  988:     URLAuth = url(group_name(Config), "alladin%40example.com:sesame", "/userinfo.html", Config),
  989:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  990:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  991: 
  992:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
  993: 	= httpc:request(get, {URLAuth, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  994: 
  995:     URLUnAuth = url(group_name(Config), "alladin%40example.com:foobar", "/userinfo.html", Config),
  996: 
  997:     {ok, {{_,401, _}, [_ | _], _}} =
  998: 	httpc:request(get, {URLUnAuth, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  999:

 1012: streaming_error(doc) ->
 1013:     [{doc, "Only async requests can be streamed - Solves OTP-8056"}];
 1014: 
 1015: streaming_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1016:     Method      = get,
 1017:     Request     = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1018:     RequestOpts = [{sync, true} | proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, [])],
 1019:     Profile     = ?profile(Config),
 1020: 
 1021:     {error, streaming_error} = httpc:request(Method, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1022:                                              [{stream, {self, once}} | RequestOpts], Profile),
 1023: 
 1024:     {error, streaming_error} = httpc:request(Method, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1025:                                              [{stream, self} | RequestOpts], Profile).
 1026: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1032:     {error, _} =
 1033: 	httpc:request(get, {"http://localhost:" ++
 1034: 				integer_to_list(?NOT_IN_USE_PORT)
 1035: 			    ++ "/", []},[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).

 1097: bad_response() ->
 1098:     [{doc, "Test what happens when the server does not follow the protocol"}].
 1099: 
 1100: bad_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1101: 
 1102:     URL0 = url(group_name(Config), "/missing_crlf.html", Config),
 1103:     URL1 = url(group_name(Config), "/wrong_statusline.html", Config),
 1104:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1105:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1106: 
 1107:     Response = httpc:request(get, {URL0, []}, [{timeout, 400},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1108:                              RequestOpts, Profile),
 1109:     true = is_timeout_response(Response),
 1110:     ct:log("First response: ~p~n", [Response]),
 1111:     {error, Reason} = httpc:request(get, {URL1, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1112:                                     RequestOpts, Profile),
 1113: 
 1114:     ct:log("Wrong Statusline: ~p~n", [Reason]).

 1123:                              RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1124:     ct:log("Timeout response: ~p~n", [Response]),
 1125:     true = is_timeout_response(Response).

 1130: internal_server_error() ->
 1131:     [{doc, "Test 50X codes"}].
 1132: internal_server_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1133: 
 1134:     URL500 = url(group_name(Config), "/500.html", Config),
 1135:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1136:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1137: 
 1138:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1139: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL500, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1140: 
 1141:     URL503 = url(group_name(Config), "/503.html", Config),
 1142: 
 1143:     %% Used to be able to make the service available after retry.
 1144:     ets:new(unavailable, [named_table, public, set]),
 1145:     ets:insert(unavailable, {503, unavailable}),
 1146: 
 1147:     {ok, {{_,200, _}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1148: 	httpc:request(get, {URL503, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1149: 
 1150:     ets:insert(unavailable, {503, long_unavailable}),
 1151: 
 1152:     {ok, {{_,503, _}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1153: 	httpc:request(get, {URL503, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1154: 
 1155:     ets:delete(unavailable).

 1201:                       RequestOpts, Profile),
 1202:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body1),
 1203:     {ok, {{"HTTP/1.1", 200, _}, [_ | _], Body2 = [_ | _]}} =

 1229: 
 1230: headers() ->
 1231:     [{doc,"Use as many request headers as possible not used in proxy_headers"}].
 1232: headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1233: 
 1234:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1235:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1236:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1237:     DocRoot = proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config),
 1238: 
 1239:     {ok, FileInfo} =
 1240: 	file:read_file_info(filename:join([DocRoot,"dummy.html"])),
 1241:     CreatedSec =
 1242: 	calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 1243: 	  FileInfo#file_info.mtime),
 1244: 
 1245:     Mod = httpd_util:rfc1123_date(
 1246: 	    calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
 1247: 	      CreatedSec-1)),
 1248: 
 1249:     Date = httpd_util:rfc1123_date({date(), time()}),
 1250: 
 1251:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1252: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-Modified-Since",
 1253: 				   Mod},
 1254: 				  {"From","webmaster@erlang.se"},
 1255: 				  {"Date", Date}
 1256: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1257: 
 1258:     Mod1 =  httpd_util:rfc1123_date(
 1259: 	      calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
 1260: 		CreatedSec+1)),
 1261: 
 1262:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1263: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-UnModified-Since",
 1264: 				   Mod1}
 1265: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1266: 
 1267:     Tag = httpd_util:create_etag(FileInfo),
 1268: 
 1269: 
 1270:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1271: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-Match",
 1272: 				   Tag}
 1273: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1274: 
 1275:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}} =
 1276: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-None-Match",
 1277: 				   "NotEtag,NeihterEtag"},
 1278: 				  {"Connection", "Close"}
 1279: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
 1280: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1281: headers_dummy() ->
 1282:     ["Test the code for handling headers we do not want/can send "
 1283:      "to a real server. Note it is not logical to send"
 1284:      "all of these headers together, we only want to test that"
 1285:      "the code for handling headers will not crash."].
 1286: 
 1287: headers_dummy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1288: 
 1289:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy_headers.html", Config),
 1290:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1291: 
 1292:     Foo = http_chunk:encode("foobar") ++
 1293: 	binary_to_list(http_chunk:encode_last()),
 1294:     FooBar =  Foo ++ "\r\n\r\nOther:inets_test\r\n\r\n",
 1295: 
 1296:     UserPasswd = base64:encode_to_string("Alladin:Sesame"),
 1297:     Auth = "Basic " ++ UserPasswd,
 1298: 
 1299:     %% The dummy server will ignore the headers, we only want to test
 1300:     %% that the client header-handling code. This would not
 1301:     %% be a valid http-request!
 1302:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1303: 	httpc:request(post,
 1304: 		     {URL,
 1305: 		      [{"Via",
 1306: 			"1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)"},
 1307: 		       {"Warning","1#pseudonym foobar"},
 1308: 		       {"Vary","*"},
 1309: 		       {"Upgrade","HTTP/2.0"},
 1310: 		       {"Pragma", "1#no-cache"},
 1311: 		       {"Cache-Control", "no-cache"},
 1312: 		       {"Connection", "close"},
 1313: 		       {"Date", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1314: 		       {"Accept", " text/plain; q=0.5, text/html"},
 1315: 		       {"Accept-Language", "en"},
 1316: 		       {"Accept-Encoding","chunked"},
 1317: 		       {"Accept-Charset", "ISO8859-1"},
 1318: 		       {"Authorization", Auth},
 1319: 		       {"Expect", "1#100-continue"},
 1320: 		       {"User-Agent","inets"},
 1321: 		       {"Transfer-Encoding","chunked"},
 1322: 		       {"Range", " bytes=0-499"},
 1323: 		       {"If-Range", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1324: 		       {"If-Match", "*"},
 1325: 		       {"Content-Type", "text/plain"},
 1326: 		       {"Content-Length", "6"},
 1327: 		       {"Content-Language", "en"},
 1328: 		       {"Content-Location", "http://www.foobar.se"},
 1329: 		       {"Content-MD5",
 1330: 			"104528739076276072743283077410617235478"},
 1331: 		       {"Content-Range", "bytes 0-499/1234"},
 1332: 		       {"Allow", "GET"},
 1333: 		       {"Proxy-Authorization", Auth},
 1334: 		       {"Expires", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1335: 		       {"Upgrade", "HTTP/2.0"},
 1336: 		       {"Last-Modified", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1337: 		       {"Trailer","1#User-Agent"}
 1338: 		      ], "text/plain", FooBar},
 1339: 		     [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1340: 
 1341: 
 1342: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1343:

 1347:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, Headers, [_|_]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1348:                                                       RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1349:     "a b" = proplists:get_value("folded", Headers).

 1353: headers_conflict_chunked_with_length() ->
 1354:     [{doc, "Test the code for handling headers with both Transfer-Encoding"
 1355:      "and Content-Length which must receive error in default (not relaxed) mode"
 1356:      "and must receive successful response in relaxed mode"}].
 1357: headers_conflict_chunked_with_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1358:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/headers_conflict_chunked_with_length.html", Config), []},
 1359:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1360:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1361:     {error, {could_not_parse_as_http, _}} = httpc:request(get, Request,
 1362:                                                           [{relaxed, false},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1363:                                                           RequestOpts, Profile),
 1364:     {ok,{{_,200,_},_,_}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [{relaxed, true}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1365:                                          RequestOpts, Profile),
 1366:     ok.

 1368: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1369: invalid_headers() ->
 1370:     [{doc, "Test invalid header format"}].
 1371: invalid_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1372:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1373:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1374:     {error,{invalid_header,{"headers",
 1375:                             [{"user-agent","httpc"}]}}}	=
 1376:         httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"headers", [{"user-agent", "httpc"}]}]},
 1377:                                   [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1378: 
 1379: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1380: invalid_headers_key(Config) ->
 1381:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1382:                 [{cookie, "valid cookie"}]},
 1383:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1384:     {error, {headers_error, invalid_field}} =
 1385:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1386: 
 1387: invalid_headers_value(Config) ->
 1388:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1389:                 [{"cookie", atom_value}]},
 1390:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1391:     {error, {headers_error, invalid_value}} =
 1392:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1393: 
 1394: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1395: 
 1396: %% Doc not generated, but we can live without that.  It should be
 1397: %%  [{doc, "Header type test"}].
 1398: -define(HDR_TYPE_TEST(Name, Method, Value),
 1399:         Name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1400:             test_header_type(Config, Method, Value)).
 1401: 
 1402: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_0, get, "stringheader").
 1403: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_1, get, <<"binary">>).
 1404: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_2, get, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1405: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_3, head, "stringheader").
 1406: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_4, head, <<"binary">>).
 1407: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_5, head, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1408: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_6, post, "stringheader").
 1409: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_7, post, <<"binary">>).
 1410: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_8, post, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1411: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_9, put, "stringheader").
 1412: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_10, put, <<"binary">>).
 1413: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_11, put, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1414: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_12, delete, "stringheader").
 1415: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_13, delete, <<"binary">>).
 1416: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_14, delete, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1417: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_15, trace, "stringheader").
 1418: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_16, trace, <<"binary">>).
 1419: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_17, trace, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1420: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_18, patch, "stringheader").
 1421: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_19, patch, <<"binary">>).
 1422: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_20, patch, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1423: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_21, options, "stringheader").
 1424: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_22, options, <<"binary">>).
 1425: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_23, options, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1426: 
 1427: test_header_type(Config, Method, Value) ->
 1428:     {Method, Value, {ok, _Data}} =
 1429:         {Method, Value,
 1430:          httpc:request(Method,
 1431:                       make_request(Config, Method, Value),
 1432:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1433:                       [], ?profile(Config))}.
 1434: 
 1435: make_request(Config, Method, Value) ->
 1436:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1437:     Headers = [{"other-header", Value},
 1438:                {"user-agent", Value}],
 1439:     %% Generate request with or without body, depending on method.
 1440:     case method_type(Method) of
 1441:         read ->
 1442:             {URL, Headers};
 1443:         write ->
 1444:             {URL, Headers, "text/plain", ""}
 1445:     end.
 1446: 
 1447: method_type(Method) ->
 1448:     case Method of
 1449:         get -> read;
 1450:         head -> read;
 1451:         options -> read;
 1452:         trace -> read;
 1453:         post -> write;
 1454:         put -> write;
 1455:         delete -> write;
 1456:         patch -> write
 1457:     end.
 1458: 
 1459: is_timeout_response({error, timeout}) -> true;
 1460: is_timeout_response({error, {failed_connect, [{to_address, {_Host, _Port}},
 1461:                                               {Proto, [Proto], timeout}]}}) -> true;
 1462: is_timeout_response(_Response) -> false.
 1463: 
 1464: 
 1465: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1466: 
 1467: invalid_body(Config) ->
 1468:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1469:     {error, invalid_request} =
 1470:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], <<"text/plain">>, "foobar"},
 1471:                       [], []).
 1472: 
 1473: invalid_body_fun(Config) ->
 1474:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1475:     BodyFun = fun() -> body_part end,
 1476:     {error, {bad_body_generator, _}} =
 1477:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/plain", {BodyFun, init}},
 1478:                       [], []).
 1479: 
 1480: 
 1481: invalid_method(Config) ->
 1482:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1483:     {error, invalid_method} =
 1484:         httpc:request(past, {URL, [], <<"text/plain">>, "foobar"},
 1485:                       [], []).
 1486: 
 1487: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1488: 
 1489: binary_url(Config) ->
 1490:     URL = uri_string:normalize(url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config)),
 1491:     case group_name(Config) of
 1492:         https -> ok;
 1493:         _ -> {ok, _Response} = httpc:request(unicode:characters_to_binary(URL), ?profile(Config))
 1494:     end.
 1495: 
 1496: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1497: 
 1498: iolist_body(Config) ->
 1499:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1500:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1501: 
 1502:     ProcessHeaders = 
 1503:         fun 
 1504:             F([], Acc) ->
 1505:                 Acc;
 1506:             F([Line|Tail], Acc0) ->
 1507:                 Acc1 = 
 1508:                     case binary:split(Line, <<": ">>, [trim_all]) of
 1509:                         [Key, Value] ->
 1510:                             Acc0#{Key => Value};
 1511:                         _ ->
 1512:                             Acc0
 1513:                     end,
 1514:                 F(Tail, Acc1)
 1515:         end,
 1516:     
 1517:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() ->
 1518:         {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1519:         receive
 1520:             {tcp, Accept, Msg} ->
 1521:                 ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg]),
 1522:                 [_HeadLine | HeaderLines] = binary:split(Msg, <<"\r\n">>, [global]),
 1523:                 Headers = ProcessHeaders(HeaderLines, #{}),
 1524:                 ContentLength = maps:get(<<"content-length">>, Headers, "-1"),
 1525:                 gen_tcp:send(Accept, [
 1526:                     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n",
 1527:                     "\r\n",
 1528:                     ContentLength
 1529:                 ])
 1530:         after
 1531:             1000 ->
 1532:                 ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1533:         end
 1534:     end),
 1535: 
 1536:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1537:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1538:     ReqBody = [
 1539:         <<"abc">>,
 1540:         <<"def">>
 1541:     ],
 1542:     {ok, Resp} = httpc:request(post, {URL, _Headers = [], _ContentType = "text/plain", ReqBody},
 1543:                                [], [], ?profile(Config)),
 1544:     ct:log("Got response ~p", [Resp]),
 1545:     case Resp of
 1546:         {{"HTTP/1.1", 200, "OK"}, [], RespBody} ->
 1547:             ReqBody_ContentLength = list_to_integer([C || C <- RespBody, C =/= $\s]),
 1548:             ?assertEqual(iolist_size(ReqBody), ReqBody_ContentLength);
 1549:         _ ->
 1550:             ct:fail("Didn't receive the correct response")
 1551:     end.
 1552: 
 1553: 
 1554: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1555: 
 1556: no_scheme(_Config) ->
 1557:     {error,{bad_scheme,"ftp"}} = httpc:request("ftp://foobar"),
 1558:     {error,{no_scheme}} = httpc:request("//foobar"),
 1559:     {error,{no_scheme}} = httpc:request("foobar"),
 1560:     ok.
 1561: 
 1562: 
 1563: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1564: 
 1565: invalid_uri(Config) ->
 1566:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/bar?x[]=a", Config),
 1567:     {error, invalid_uri} = httpc:request(URL),
 1568:     ok.
 1569: 
 1570: 
 1571: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1572: remote_socket_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1573:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config),
 1574:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1575:     {error, socket_closed_remotely} = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1576:                                                     RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1577: 
 1578: 
 1579: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1580: 
 1581: remote_socket_close_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1582:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), []},
 1583:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1584:     Options     = [{sync, false} | RequestOpts],
 1585:     {ok, RequestId} =
 1586: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options, ?profile(Config)),
 1587:     receive
 1588: 	{http, {RequestId, {error, socket_closed_remotely}}} ->
 1589: 	    ok
 1590:     end.
 1591: 
 1592: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1593: 
 1594: process_leak_on_keepalive(Config) ->
 1595:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1596:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1597:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1598:     HttpcHandlers0 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1599:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1600:     HttpcHandlers1 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1601:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1602:     %% Assuming that the new handler will be selected for keep_alive
 1603:     %% which could not be the case if other handlers existed
 1604:     [{undefined, Pid, worker, [httpc_handler]}] =
 1605:         ordsets:to_list(
 1606:           ordsets:subtract(ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers1),
 1607:                            ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers0))),
 1608:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1609:     #session{socket=Socket} = element(3, State),
 1610:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 1611: 
 1612:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1613:     %% bad handler with the closed socket should get replaced by
 1614:     %% the new one, so children count should stay the same
 1615:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1616:     ok.
 1617: 
 1618: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1619: 
 1620: stream_to_pid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1621:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(pid),
 1622:     Receiver    = ReceiverPid,
 1623: 
 1624:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1625: 
 1626:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1627: 
 1628: stream_through_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1629:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(function),
 1630:     Receiver = stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid),
 1631: 
 1632:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1633: 
 1634:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1635: 
 1636: stream_through_mfa(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1637:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(mfa),
 1638:     Receiver    = {?MODULE, stream_deliver, [mfa, ReceiverPid]},
 1639: 
 1640:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config).
 1641: 
 1642: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1643: 
 1644: inet_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1645:     MaxSessions      = 5,
 1646:     MaxKeepAlive     = 10,
 1647:     KeepAliveTimeout = timer:minutes(2),
 1648:     ConnOptions = [{max_sessions,          MaxSessions},
 1649: 		   {max_keep_alive_length, MaxKeepAlive},
 1650: 		   {keep_alive_timeout,    KeepAliveTimeout}],
 1651:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1652:     ok = httpc:set_options(ConnOptions, Profile),
 1653: 
 1654:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1655:     Timeout      = timer:seconds(5),
 1656:     ConnTimeout  = Timeout + timer:seconds(5),
 1657:     HttpOptions = [{timeout, Timeout}, {connect_timeout, ConnTimeout}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1658:     Options0     = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    87},
 1659: 				   {recbuf, 16#FFFF},
 1660: 				   {sndbuf, 16#FFFF}]}],
 1661: 
 1662:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody0 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, HttpOptions,
 1663:                                                                      Options0, Profile),
 1664:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody0),
 1665: 
 1666:     Options1 = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    84},
 1667: 			       {recbuf, 32#1FFFF},
 1668: 			       {sndbuf, 32#1FFFF}]}],
 1669:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody1 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1670:                                                                      Options1, Profile),
 1671:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody1).
 1672:

 1678:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1679:                                                  RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),

 1691: multipart_chunks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1692:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/multipart_chunks.html", Config), []},
 1693:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1694:     {ok, Ref} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1695:                               [{sync, false}, {stream, self} | RequestOpts], ?profile(Config)),
 1696:     ok = receive_stream_n(Ref, 10),
 1697:     httpc:cancel_request(Ref).

 1699: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1700: timeout_memory_leak() ->
 1701:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8739"}].
 1702: timeout_memory_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1703:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 1704:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1705:     Request = {?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html", []},
 1706:     Profile = ?config(profile, Config),
 1707:     WaitForCancelRequestToFinish =
 1708:         fun F(Handlers = [_ | _]) when is_list(Handlers) -> ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers});
 1709:             F(Handlers) when is_list(Handlers) -> ok;
 1710:             F(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1711:                 Info = httpc:info(Profile),
 1712:                 ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 1713:                 {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 1714:                     lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 1715:                 case Handlers of
 1716:                     [] ->
 1717:                         ok;
 1718:                     _ ->
 1719:                         ct:sleep(1)
 1720:                 end,
 1721:                 case N of
 1722:                     0 ->
 1723:                         F(Handlers);
 1724:                     _ ->
 1725:                         F(N-1)
 1726:                 end
 1727:         end,
 1728:     case httpc:request(get, Request, [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}], [{sync, true}], Profile) of
 1729: 	{error, timeout} ->
 1730:        WaitForCancelRequestToFinish(5);
 1731: 	Unexpected ->
 1732: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 1733:     end.
 1734: 
 1735: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1736: 
 1737: wait_for_whole_response() ->
 1738:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8154"}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 1739: wait_for_whole_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1740: 
 1741:      ReqSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1742:      RespSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1743:      {ok, Server, Port} = start_slow_server(RespSeqNumServer),
 1744:      Clients = run_clients(105, Port, ReqSeqNumServer),
 1745:      ok = wait4clients(Clients, timer:minutes(3)),
 1746:      Server ! shutdown,
 1747:      RespSeqNumServer ! shutdown,
 1748:      ReqSeqNumServer ! shutdown.
 1749: 
 1750: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1751: post_204_chunked() ->
 1752:     [{doc,"Test that chunked encoded 204 responses do not freeze the http client"}].
 1753: post_204_chunked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1754:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1755:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1756:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1757:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1758:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1759:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1760:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1761:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1762:         "\r\n",
 1763:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1764: 
 1765:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1766:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1767:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1768:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1769: 
 1770:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1771:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204",
 1772:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1773:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1774:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile),
 1775:     timer:sleep(500),
 1776:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1777:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile).
 1778: 
 1779: custom_receive() ->
 1780:     receive
 1781:         {tcp, _, Msg} ->
 1782:             ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg])
 1783:     after
 1784:         1000 ->
 1785:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1786:     end.
 1787: 
 1788: %% Custom server is used to test special cases when using chunked encoding
 1789: custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket, ReceiveFun) ->
 1790:     {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1791:     ReceiveFun(),
 1792:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1793:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1794: 
 1795: custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun) ->
 1796:     ReceiveFun(),
 1797:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1798:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1799: 
 1800: send_response(Msg, Chunk, Socket) ->
 1801:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
 1802:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 1803:     timer:sleep(250),
 1804:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Chunk).
 1805: 
 1806: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1807: head_chunked_empty_body() ->
 1808:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty chunked-encoded body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1809: head_chunked_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1810:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1811:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1812:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1813:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1814:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1815:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1816:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1817:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1818:         "\r\n",
 1819:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1820: 
 1821:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1822:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1823:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1824:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1825:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1826:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1827:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1828:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1829:     timer:sleep(500),
 1830:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1831:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1832: 
 1833: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1834: head_empty_body() ->
 1835:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1836: head_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1837:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1838:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1839:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1840:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1841:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1842:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1843:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1844:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1845:         "\r\n",
 1846:     NoChunk = "", %% Do not chunk encode!
 1847: 
 1848:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1849:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1850:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, NoChunk, ListenSocket,
 1851:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1852:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1853:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1854:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1855:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1856:     timer:sleep(500),
 1857:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1858:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1859: 
 1860: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1861: chunkify_fun() ->
 1862:     [{doc,"Test that a chunked encoded request does not include the 'Content-Length header'"}].
 1863: chunkify_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1864:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1865:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1866:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1867:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1868:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1869:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1870:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1871:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1872:         "\r\n",
 1873:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1874: 
 1875:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1876:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1877:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1878:                                   fun chunkify_receive/0) end),
 1879: 
 1880:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1881:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example",
 1882:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1883:     Fun = fun(_) -> {ok,<<1>>,eof_body} end,
 1884:     Acc = start,
 1885: 
 1886:     {ok, {{_,204,_}, _, _}} =
 1887:         httpc:request(put, {URL, [], "text/html", {chunkify, Fun, Acc}},
 1888:                       [], [], ?profile(Config)).
 1889: 
 1890: chunkify_receive() ->
 1891:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 1892:         "Content-Length: 0\r\n\r\n",
 1893:     receive
 1894:         {tcp, Port, Msg} ->
 1895:             case binary:match(Msg, <<"content-length">>) of
 1896:                 nomatch ->
 1897:                     ct:log("Message received: ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]);
 1898:                 {_, _} ->
 1899:                     ct:log("Message received (negative): ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]),
 1900:                     %% Signal a testcase failure when the received HTTP request
 1901:                     %% contains a 'Content-Length' header.
 1902:                     gen_tcp:send(Port, Error),
 1903:                     ct:fail("Content-Length present in received headers.")
 1904:             end
 1905:     after
 1906:         1000 ->
 1907:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1908:     end.
 1909: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1910: stream_fun_server_close() ->
 1911:     [{doc, "Test that an error msg is received when using a receiver fun as stream target"}].
 1912: stream_fun_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1913:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/delay_close.html", Config), []},
 1914:     Self = self(),
 1915:     Fun = fun(X) -> Self ! X end,
 1916:     % Use the default proflie here as process_leak_on_keepalive depends on this case
 1917:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 1918:                                     [{sync, false}, {receiver, Fun}], ?profile(Config)),
 1919:     receive
 1920:         {RequestId, {error, Reason}} ->
 1921:             ct:log("Close ~p", [Reason]),
 1922:             ok
 1923:     after 13000 ->
 1924:             ct:fail(did_not_receive_close)
 1925:     end. 
 1926: 
 1927: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1928: server_closing_connection_on_first_response() ->
 1929:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on first response."
 1930:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1931:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1932:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1933: server_closing_connection_on_first_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1934:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1935:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1936:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1937:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1938:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1939:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1940:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1941:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1942:         end,
 1943:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1944:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1945:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1946:     %% Test case assumes at most one reusable past session.
 1947:     _ = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204),
 1948:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1949:     ok.
 1950: 
 1951: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1952: server_closing_connection_on_second_response() ->
 1953:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on second response."
 1954:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1955:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1956:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1957: server_closing_connection_on_second_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1958:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1959:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1960:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1961:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1962:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1963:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1964:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1965:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1966:         end,
 1967:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1968:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1969:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1970:     %% Test case assumes no reusable past sessions.
 1971:     SendOct0 = 0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1972:     case ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204) of SendOct1 when SendOct1 > SendOct0 -> ok end,
 1973:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1974:     ok.
 1975: 
 1976: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1977: slow_connection() ->
 1978:     [{doc, "Test that a request on a slow keep-alive connection won't crash the httpc_manager"}].
 1979: slow_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1980:     BodyFun = fun(0) -> eof;
 1981:                  (LenLeft) -> timer:sleep(1000),
 1982:                               {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
 1983:               end,
 1984:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE:esi_post", Config),
 1985:                 [{"content-length", "100"}],
 1986:                 "text/plain",
 1987:                 {BodyFun, 100}},
 1988:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1989:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile),
 1990:     %% Second request causes a crash if gen_server timeout is not set to infinity
 1991:     %% in httpc_handler.
 1992:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile).
 1993: 
 1994: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1995: unix_domain_socket() ->
 1996:     [{doc, "Test HTTP requests over unix domain sockets"}].
 1997: unix_domain_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1998: 
 1999:     URL = "http:///v1/kv/foo",
 2000:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2001: 
 2002:     ct:log("Using profile ~w", [Profile]),
 2003:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}]} =
 2004:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket], Profile),
 2005:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 2006: 	= httpc:request(put, {URL, [], [], ""}, [], [], Profile),
 2007:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 2008:         = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 2009: 
 2010: invalid_ipfamily_unix_socket() ->
 2011:     [{doc, "Test that httpc profile can't end up having invalid combination of ipfamily and unix_socket options"}].
 2012: invalid_ipfamily_unix_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2013:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config, httpc:default_profile()),
 2014: 
 2015:     ct:log("Using profile ~w", [Profile]),
 2016:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}, {ipfamily, local}]} =
 2017:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket, ipfamily], Profile),
 2018:     ?assertMatch({error, _}, httpc:set_option(unix_socket, undefined, Profile)),
 2019:     ?assertMatch({error, _}, httpc:set_option(ipfamily, inet, Profile)),
 2020:     ?assertMatch({error, _}, httpc:set_option(ipfamily, inetv6, Profile)),
 2021:     ok = httpc:set_options([{unix_socket, undefined}, {ipfamily, inet}], Profile),
 2022:     ?assertMatch({error, _}, httpc:set_option(unix_socket, ?UNIX_SOCKET, Profile)).
 2023: 
 2024: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2025: delete_no_body() ->
 2026:     [{doc, "Test that a DELETE request without Body does not send a Content-Type header - Solves ERL-536"}].
 2027: delete_no_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2028:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2029:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2030:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2031:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2032:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, _}} =
 2033:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 2034:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2035:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, [], "text/plain", "TEST"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2036:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
 2037: 
 2038: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2039: post_with_content_type(doc) ->
 2040:     ["Test that a POST request with explicit 'Content-Type' does not drop the 'Content-Type' header - Solves ERL-736"];
 2041: post_with_content_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2042:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2043:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2044:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2045:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2046:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", ""},
 2047:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 2048:
